testsuite.name: PlanerResource Unit Tests

testcase.name: Get all pairings should return list
Generate schedule should reject configuration with duplicate names
Pairings endpoint should return only player names and frequency
Player usage endpoint should return correct usage statistics
Generate schedule should reject empty player list
Generate schedule should use all provided players
Generated schedule should have correct round structure
Generated schedule should have all required fields
Health endpoint should return OK status
Get statistics should return valid stats
Generate schedule should accept valid configuration
Generate schedule should reject configuration with 0 rounds
Generate schedule should reject configuration with too few players
